body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Powell Automotive Group. My name is Jose Powell, how may I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Nicole Anderson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Nicole. Could you kindly provide me with your contact number? I would also need your email address for our records.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is nine eight seven six five four three two one zero. And my email address is nicole.anderson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Nicole. We appreciate your cooperation. Is there anything else you would like to discuss regarding your experience with us today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was surprised by the billing statement I received after my last visit.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for any confusion, Nicole. I will look into this matter for you. Could you provide me with the date of your last visit and the specific charges you found concerning?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My last visit was on the twelfth of June and I found an unexpected charge of two zero zero dollars for maintenance services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing those details, Nicole. I will investigate the issue and get back to you soon with an update. Your patience is greatly appreciated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us, Nicole! We value your feedback and aim to resolve any concerns promptly. Have a wonderful day!
